descriptions.feeling_focused: ...and now I've lost everything I ever owned.

descriptions.action_focused: ...came to an abrupt end after I was laid off.
descriptions.feeling_focused: ...and I have no idea how I'm going to make ends meet.

descriptions.subject_focused: The person I thought was my soulmate...
descriptions.action_focused: ...told me they don't love me anymore.
descriptions.feeling_focused: ...and now my heart is completely broken.

descriptions.subject_focused: Someone I trusted with my life...
descriptions.action_focused: ...went behind my back and betrayed me.
descriptions.feeling_focused: ...and I feel like I can never trust anyone again.

descriptions.action_focused: ...has taken a turn for the worse with a serious diagnosis.
descriptions.feeling_focused: ...and I'm terrified of what's going to happen to me.

descriptions.action_focused: ...has changed overnight after I came into a lot of money.
descriptions.feeling_focused: ...and now I have more wealth than I ever dreamed of.

descriptions.action_focused: ...finally paid off and I was offered my dream job.
descriptions.feeling_focused: ...and I feel like my professional life is just beginning.

descriptions.action_focused: ...has been completely transformed by someone new.
descriptions.feeling_focused: ...and I'm starting to believe they might be the one.

descriptions.action_focused: ...is being packed into boxes for a move to a new city.
descriptions.feeling_focused: ...and I'm leaving everything I've ever known behind.

descriptions.action_focused: ...is in the middle of planning a massive wedding.
descriptions.feeling_focused: ...and I'm caught between the joy and the overwhelming stress of it all.
